com.cyc.baseclient.api

Class CycLeaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.cyc.baseclient.api.CycLeaseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LeaseManager, Runnable

    public class CycLeaseManager
extends Thread
implements LeaseManager

    CycLeaseManager manages api service leases between a Cyc image (server) and application client.

    Copyright (c) 2003 - 2006 Cycorp, Inc. All rights reserved.
    This software is the proprietary information of Cycorp, Inc.

    Use is subject to license terms.
